data.prayer: Father, convict the 19,408 believers in Hauts-de-Seine to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,579,500 citizens of Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Hauts-de-Seine to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 19,408 believers in the county of Hauts-de-Seine with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Moor people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, make the 965,896 people in the county of Hauts-de-Seine who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,579,500.

We estimate Hauts-de-Seine has 19,408 people who might know Jesus, 965,896 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 594,196 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,560,092 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
